description: Lists the tags applied to the resource identified by its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource's tags to list.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource's tags that you listed.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of the resource's tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key part of a tag's key-value pair. The key can't start with aws:.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value part of a tag's key-value pair.
